t: Amazon.com: Merkur Double Edge Blade Razor, Black : Beauty & Personal Care
Amazon.com: Merkur Classic 2-Piece Double Edge Safety Razor Gold Plated, 1 Count : Beauty & Personal Care
s: At first I thought it was entirely ... other brand had actually been, but then noted I could shave downwards and upwards with ease. It was when I finished and noted not a single usual few nick spots or any burn what so ever when I applied some aftershave that I realized what a quality shave it was! I felt zero burn and not a single knick or raw spot even shaving both ways. Highly recommend ... If you can afford it buy the Merkur 34g instead ...

t: Amazon.com: Merkur Progress Adjustable Safety Razor, MK-500001
s: Everyone needs to find what works for them, but in case anyone wonders, here is my routine: * I load the handle with Merkur blades. I know there are a lot of comments by others that use different brands, but the Merkur works for me and, even with my heavy beard, the blades last about 3 weeks each.
